title: Ken Block Steps Up to the HELM
description: SPY + Ken Block present the next evolution of the recently-launched and much-lauded Helm sunglasses; a vintage-inspired eyewear collaboration between the rally car racing icon and the SoCal eyewear brand. The SPY + Ken Block Helm feature custom-color arm variations in the Signature Series—which can be snapped-on and--off and mixed-and-matched—are further punctuated with asymmetrical tip colors on the left temple, inspired by Block's mismatched wheel color and single-spoke accents on his 650-horsepower, 2.0-liter H.F.H.V. Ford Fiesta's Gymkhana setup for 2012. Every pair of shades comes with a free bonus set of temples. The frames also feature mirrored lenses in a multitude of colors that help complete the throwback story, echoing a swagger that pervaded American fashion through the '70s and '80s.
